text:
Hi everyone!
I'm creating custom quotes using a clonned default quote template, but I can't find out how to show in the html version of the quote where the page limits of the donwloaded PDF version would be, like the lines that indicates page limits that you can see when working with excel, can anyone give me some advice?
What I'm trying to do is to give the users some visual indicator to show them where the pages of the pdf version would start. I don't know if I need to wrap all the content in some container of a specific height. Thanks in advance!
